c:attribute.name: rechargeStatus
c:attribute.description: Recharge status of the water softener: READY (providing soft water), RECHARGING (actively regenerating), RECHARGE_SCHEDULED (recharge required and will be done at rechargeStartTime)

c:attribute.name: currentSaltLevel
c:attribute.description: Current salt level from 0 (empty) to maxSaltLevel

c:attribute.name: maxSaltLevel
c:attribute.description: Max salt level for this softener

c:attribute.name: saltLevelEnabled
c:attribute.description: true indicates currentSaltLevel should be accurate - false indicates currentSaltLevel should be ignored

c:attribute.name: rechargeStartTime
c:attribute.description: When regeneration is needed, hour of the day when it should be scheduled (e.g. 14 = 2:00 PM). Does not guarantee that regeneration will occur daily.

c:attribute.name: rechargeTimeRemaining
c:attribute.description: The number of minutes left before the softener completes its recharge cycle.

c:attribute.name: daysPoweredUp
c:attribute.description: The number of consecutive days the softener has been powered on

c:attribute.name: totalRecharges
c:attribute.description: The total number of recharge cycles the softener has performed since being added to the network

c:method.name: rechargeNow
c:method.description: Forces a recharge on the water softener.
